name: h3
description: The Louisville Slugger Meta Drop 10 USA Baseball Bat is a top-tier choice for players seeking a balanced swing feel and outstanding performance. With its two-piece composite construction and a 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter, this bat is USA certified, ensuring it's ready for the field. The innovative EKO Composite Material offers a lightweight feel and a massive barrel, while the VCX2 Connection significantly reduces hand vibration, providing a superior feel with every hit. The GT1 End Cap optimizes barrel length and swing speed, and the LS Pro Comfort Grip delivers the perfect mix of tack and cushion. The striking black, orange, and blue colorway adds a stylish touch to the renowned Louisville Slugger Meta series. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
